main event: A couple sighted a bright light in the sky over Tel Aviv, Israel, on July 2, 1960.
interesting points: The light appeared to glow and grow larger, The sighting lasted approximately one minute, There was no sound associated with the light, The report was classified as a possible satellite observation, The evaluation ruled out several potential explanations including meteors and aircraft.
sighted object: a bright, stationary light in the sky
witness description: US Naval Attach√© and his wife
